ui.levelsSortNote: Levels are sorted by ascending value when saving.
ui.nativeLevelNote: The level with value 1.0 represents full comprehension (native level).

reset.title: Reset Proficiency Levels
reset.content: Are you sure you want to reset all proficiency levels to their default values? This action is irreversible.

notifications.noLanguagesConfigured: No languages are configured. Please ask the GM to configure available languages.
notifications.allLanguagesAssigned: All available languages have already been assigned to this actor.
notifications.wordAlreadyKnown: The word "{word}" is already in the known words list.

updates.title: The module has been updated to version 1.6!

content.title: New Features (1.6)
list: Configurable known words for a language and a character, allowing decryption of certain words without knowledge of the language.
Similar words feature: calculation of words resembling the encrypted word to display the known word instead of the encrypted word with a similarity percentage.
Capitalization preservation: the first encrypted character is capitalized if the word starts with a capital letter.

content.title: New Features (1.5)
list: Encryption of similar words now yields distinct outputs.
Decryption is now player-specific, so two players will decrypt the same word differently.

content.title: Fix 1.5.1
list: Fixed an issue where already encrypted words were being re-encrypted.

content.title: Fix 1.5.2
list: Display of language names and levels in settings instead of IDs.
Correct display of levels when configuring an actor's languages. Previously, the level shown at the top of the list was not the actual level.

version.name: Last Seen Version
version.hint: Stores the last version of the module shown to the user
